member.name: T:Puzzles.Onet.Concepts.Grid
member.summary: Represents a grid of match.
member.remarks: The grid will use an array of values to describe internal items. Different elements will be represented as its value. Using 255 (i.e. to describe an empty cell).

member.name: P:Puzzles.Onet.Concepts.Grid.Pattern
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\d{1,3}
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
â—‹ Match a Unicode digit atomically at least 1 and at most 3 times.

member.name: M:Puzzles.Onet.Concepts.Grid.Apply(Puzzles.Onet.Concepts.ItemMatch)
member.summary: Apply a match, removing the pair of cells from the grid, making those two cells empty.

member.name: M:Puzzles.Onet.Concepts.Grid.ToString(System.String)
member.remarks:
All formats:
Format Meaning
"a" Array-like format, output like an 2D-array sequence, keeping new line characters if line ends
"f" Sequence-like format, output like an 1D-aray flatten each element by removing new line characters
"f+1"
Just like with format "f", but with each element added with 1
